about_the_game:
Always keep an eye out, though! Raptors and T-Rex are never too far away…

MADNESS IN THE JUNGLE
• Fight against other players to collect Money, Lava, and Bones, and use them to buy and upgrade properties.
• Discover five exclusive arenas nestled in the heart of a tropical jungle.

DINOSAUR FRENZY
• Open Community Chests to discover new power-ups.
• Overcome new chaotic events to win the race for riches.

NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
• Discover two new playable characters – the sweet Cave Kid and the adventurous Dodo.
• Customize your character with two new exclusive hats.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
• Enjoy the Dino City streets in all MONOPOLY® Madness game modes.
• Play with your friends online and get ready for some Jurassic madness!
detailed_description:
Always keep an eye out, though! Raptors and T-Rex are never too far away…

MADNESS IN THE JUNGLE
• Fight against other players to collect Money, Lava, and Bones, and use them to buy and upgrade properties.
• Discover five exclusive arenas nestled in the heart of a tropical jungle.

DINOSAUR FRENZY
• Open Community Chests to discover new power-ups.
• Overcome new chaotic events to win the race for riches.

NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
• Discover two new playable characters – the sweet Cave Kid and the adventurous Dodo.
• Customize your character with two new exclusive hats.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
• Enjoy the Dino City streets in all MONOPOLY® Madness game modes.
• Play with your friends online and get ready for some Jurassic madness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Become the most famous real estate mogul of Dino City in the new MONOPOLY® Madness DLC!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
